job_title: Entry Level Data Analyst for Lawyer Legion
full_description:
\n
Details:
\n
\n
Location: Houston, TX (Galleria area)
\n
Status: Currently scheduling interviews
\n
\n
Duties:
\n
\n
Data Entry
\n
Analyze and update data for the national lawyer directory at Lawyers.LawyerLegion.com
\n
Perform frontend and backend web updates to functionality and custom CMS at LawyerLegion.com
\n
Cross-reference and organize data in spreadsheets and SQL database tables
\n
Edit, create and execute customized PHP-based scripts used for importing fresh data
\n
Support sales team and content team by implementing updates to LawyerLegion.com platform as needed
\n
\n
Minimum Requirements:
\n
\n
On-the-job database experience or technology-related degree
\n
Able to type at least 60 WPM
\n
Proficient with Spreadsheets and MySQL databases
\n
Must be located in/near Houston, TX
\n
\n
Ideal Candidate:
\n
\n
Experience with WordPress or other CMS
\n
Experience with custom PHP-driven web platforms
\n
Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills
\n
A passionate interest in web development
\n
Familiar with PHP / MYSQL / HTML / CSS / JS / Regex
\n
\n
Job Type:
Full-time w/ competitive benefits package
\n
Please DO NOT CALL about this position
\n
If interested, please submit the form below and include your resume plus URLs of any websites that you've created or online databases that you've worked on.
\n
\n
